parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.66</value></part><part><name>Game Version (number surrounded by NO SPACES)</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value> ("local" or "global")

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value> ("local" or "global")

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name/>=<value> Multiplayer Execution ("server" or empty)

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Triggers </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Markers </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr3</name>=<value> Locations </value></part><part><name>GROUP3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr4</name>=<value> Positions </value></part><part><name>GROUP4</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Filters given list of [[Object]]s and/or [[Position]]s in relation to the given area, defined by a trigger, marker, location or array. Returns array of [[Object]]s and/or [[Position]]s from the list that are inside the area </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>positions '''inAreaArray''' trigger </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> positions: [[Array]] - [[Object]]s and/or [[Position]]s to check</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> trigger: [[Object]] - trigger with given area </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]: [[Object]]s and/or [[Position]]s inside the trigger area</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value>positions '''inAreaArray''' marker </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> positions: [[Array]] - [[Object]]s and/or [[Position]]s to check</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> marker: [[String]] - marker with given area </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]]: [[Object]]s and/or [[Position]]s inside the marker area</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s3</name>=<value>positions '''inAreaArray''' location </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p31</name>=<value> positions: [[Array]] - [[Object]]s and/or [[Position]]s to check</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER31</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p32</name>=<value> location: [[Location]] - location with given area </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER32</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r3</name>=<value> [[Array]]: [[Object]]s and/or [[Position]]s inside the location area</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s4</name>=<value> positions '''inAreaArray''' [center, a, b, angle, isRectangle, c]</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p41</name>=<value> positions: [[Array]] - [[Object]]s and/or [[Position]]s to check</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER41</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p42</name>=<value> [center, a, b, angle, isRectangle, c]: [[Array]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER42</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p43</name>=<value> center: [[Array]] - center of the area in format [[Position3D]], [[Position2D]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER43</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p44</name>=<value> a: [[Number]] - x axis (x / 2) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER44</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p45</name>=<value> b: [[Number]] - y axis (y / 2) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER45</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p46</name>=<value> angle (Optional): [[Number]] - rotation angle. Default: 0  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER46</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p47</name>=<value> isRectangle (Optional): [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if rectangle, [[false]] if ellipse. Default: [[false]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER47</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p48</name>=<value> c (Optional): [[Number]] - z axis (z / 2). Default: -1 (unlimited)</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER48</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r4</name>=<value> [[Array]]: [[Object]]s and/or [[Position]]s inside the area </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE4</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicles]] [[inAreaArray]] trigger_1;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[allUnits]] [[inAreaArray]] marker_1;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[allPlayers]] [[inAreaArray]] location_1;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> <code>[[allDead]] [[inAreaArray]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[100, 100, 0], 20, 30, 45, [[false]], 10];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE4</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[inArea]], [[triggerArea]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

[[Category:Scripting Commands Arma 3|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on June 11, 2017 - 21:33 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Tankbuster|Tankbuster]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
The array you send the command can be filtered. For example:
<code>[[vehicles]] [[inAreaArray]] "mymarker" [[select]] {_x [[isKindOf]] "StaticWeapon"}</code>
Will return only the statics inside the given marker
</dd>
</dl>
